name: Dungeon Nap
description:
Story:

Harold has been exploring an abandoned dungeon in search of treasure for days. The work is as tiring as it is rewarding. Luckily, this dungeon is full of beds! Help Harold get to bed without passing out on the floor.

How to Play:

Movement: WASD/D-Pad

Jump: Space/South Button

Dash: Shift/West Button

Reset: R/Select

Reach the bed before you pass out!

Credits:

Game made by Trenton Coggeshall

Tileset: https://tilation.itch.io/multi-size-mythical-dungeon-tileset

Character sprites: https://lionheart963.itch.io/free-platformer-assets (Sleep animation added by me)

Contains music ©2020 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io)
Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io/free-music-pack-3)

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam 171 with the theme "Siesta"
